Name: Mail_v1-0
Description: Sends emails via the Mail app. You may need to use the Contacts tool to get valid email addresses to use as the recipient before using this tool.

Functions.description: Sends emails to specified recipients using the Mail app.

messages.description: Array of message objects to be sent.

recipient.description: Array of email addresses of the recipients.

cc.description: Array of email addresses for CC recipients (optional).

bcc.description: Array of email addresses for BCC recipients (optional).

body.description: The content of the email to be sent.

subject.description: The subject of the email to be sent.
